hero.headline: We take care of your car, you save time
hero.paragraph: We offer high-quality service with an individual approach to each client. Since 2018, we have been ensuring the reliability of your vehicle based on honesty, professionalism, and excellent workmanship.

services.title: Services
services.description: We are proud to offer comprehensive car repair and service services.

suspensionRepair.title: Suspension Repair
suspensionRepair.description: Comprehensive suspension repair for comfort and safety.

electricRepair.title: Electrical Repair
electricRepair.description: Diagnostics and electrical repairs — reliability guaranteed.

tireChange.title: Tire Change
tireChange.description: Tire and rim service for comfort and safety.

acService.title: Air Conditioning Service
acService.description: Comprehensive air conditioning repair for year-round comfort.

advantages.title: Why SMotors?
advantages.description: Choose us and forget about car repair problems!

warranty.title: 1-Year Warranty
warranty.description: We offer a one-year warranty on all our services, confirming our confidence in the quality of our work.

fullService.title: Full Range of Services
fullService.description: We offer comprehensive automotive services, from diagnostics to repairs, to meet every challenge.

repairHistory.title: Vehicle Repair History
repairHistory.description: Each client receives a detailed report of their vehicle's repair history, facilitating future service planning.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: Experienced and qualified mechanics who are fully committed to ensuring the highest quality of services.

questions.question: Do I need to make an appointment in advance?
questions.answer: Although we accept walk-in customers, we recommend booking an appointment in advance to ensure service at your preferred time and avoid waiting.

questions.question: How long does a standard car inspection take?
questions.answer: A standard inspection takes about 1-2 hours. The exact time depends on the car model and the scope of services. We will inform you about the detailed time after the initial diagnostics.

questions.question: Do you provide a warranty on the services performed?
questions.answer: Yes, we provide a 12-month warranty on all performed services. It covers both parts and labor.

questions.question: What forms of payment do you accept?
questions.answer: We accept cash and bank transfers. For regular customers, we also offer the option of installment payments.

questions.question: How can I schedule an appointment?
questions.answer: You can schedule an appointment by calling the number provided in the contact section or by visiting our service center in person. Our staff will help you choose the most convenient time.

contacts.title: Our Service Locations
contacts.description: Call us to schedule an appointment!
